reviews.review: Ein all time classic und ein Muss für jeden E-Sport fan. Der Beginn einer wunderbaren Spielreihe. Seit anfang 2000 begeistert mich die Marke Couter-Strike mit Herausforderungen und Matchgames gegen andere Spieler weltweit.
cheats still work on this game epic
если вы умеете стрелять в этой игре - значит у вас прямые руки
Игра как шутер атличная, маст хэв
First CS game is much different than what we know today from GO, yet its still a solid game, that you really should play

I guess it would be ok if was still 1990 but does get repetitive at times unless you are playing a match with people you know. I do miss my favorite maps like fy_snow or 35hp but sadly so many servers are now empty 99% of the time.
Valve спасибо за такую ахрененую игру)
Starting to love this original CS!!! Great to get used to the guns and maps...
Great game to play along with friends.  Very addictivet
O MELHOR JOGO DE TIRO DA HISTÓRIA
Maravilhoso, esse jogo marcou minha adolescência!
apesar dos graficos nao serem dos melhores e uma boa alternativa pra quem tem pc fraco eu acho otimo esse jogo

The best Counter-Strike, not that CS:GO garbage
Невероятна игра, единственият и недостатък е че така и не се научих да я играя и винаги ме убиват.
Amo este juego, para mi es el mejor ♥
